title: Necrophoenix

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Scorch someone each night. You may self-target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever two or more players die at night, one of them won't die and you'll possess them as long as you're dead and not possessing someone. They'll appear to have had too-strong defense to their attackers.
- You'll gain access to their private channel and they'll gain the ability to deal a Powerful attack to someone along with their original role's abilities each night. Their win condition is changed to yours.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who would oppose you and the bodies you possess.

desc:
Post 890
*The bird of wonder dies, the maiden phoenix, her ashes new-create another heir as great in admiration as herself.*
